text: E'ina hu'negu mofa'nanetamia zamatrenke'za ana vahetera nomanisageta, ana vahepintira ne' mofavretamirera ara avre ozamiho. Ana vahe'enena mago tamarimpa hutma nomanita, mago'a zama tro'ma hunaku'ma hnageta zamaza osiho. Hagi ama ana nanekema amagema antenuta ana mopafina knare hutma mani'neta, hankavenentake vahe manigahaze. Ana hu'nesage'za henka ana mopa tamagehe'za erisanti hare'za mani vava hu'za vugahaze.
